successes.title: MYTH
successes.description: Enter the world of Myth. A fully cooperative fantasy game, featuring dynamic hobby quality miniatures.

Pledges.description: Lair Level - Merchant Level (2 Orc Minions) + 2 Arachnid Minions + 1 Class T-shirt
Minion Level - 1 Copy of Myth ($89 MSRP).
Captain Level - 1 Copy of Myth + 1 special promo Razorfiend Mini-boss miniature! (Stretch Goal rewards start here.)
Apprentice Level - Captain Level (including all stretch goals), +1 Cover Lithograph signed by Keith Lowe, +1 Orc Minion Set, +1 Arachnid Minion Set, +1 Orc Captain, and +1 Arachnid Captain.
The Pledge level is open ONLY TO RETAILERS. Backers must be verified as stores before shipment is sent. This level is NOT eligible for Stretch Goals.

Acolyte Level - Captain Level (including all stretch goals) + 1 Copy of Myth (base game) signed by team + 1 Cover Lithograph signed by Keith Lowe + 2 Orc Minion Set, +2 Arachnid Minion Set,  +2 Orc Captain, and +2 Arachnid Captain.

Archer Level - x2 Captain Levels (including all stretch goals),+ 1 Cover Lithograph signed by Keith Lowe, + 1 Copy of Myth (base game) signed by team, +1 Orc Minion Set, +1 Arachnid Minion Set, +1 Orc Captain, +1 Arachnid Captain, + 1 set of Base Heroes in Metal, + ALL Class T-shirt.

Trickster Level - x2 Captain Level (including all stretch goals) + 1 Copy of Myth (base game) signed by team + 20 of ALL Minions + 2 of ALL Captains + 2 of ALL Captains in Metal + 1 set of ALL Heroes in Metal professionally painted by BTP + ALL Class T-shirts + Be immortalized in game as a Mini-boss miniature and card (including name and art likeness) + Framed and Signed Mini-boss likeness art print.
